feed.title: Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 05:07 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.1°C
Wind: NE 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Ice pellets early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
